analysis.summary: This is the professional resume of Michael J. Boccio, detailing his experience as Managing Director of Business Development and Special Counsel at The Trump Organization from 2008-2011, where he managed global licensing, real estate developments including a $1.5 million transaction, and aviation acquisitions, along with his previous legal career at major law firms representing institutional clients in high-value transactions.
